snippet: The police said that Jamar Clark was an assault suspect, and that he was shot after interfering with paramedics trying to treat his victim and fighting with two officers.
lead_paragraph: The police said that Jamar Clark was an assault suspect, and that he was shot after interfering with paramedics trying to treat his victim and fighting with two officers.

headline.main: Minnesota: Man Shot by Police Dies
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: Man Shot By Police Dies
